txt1: The following description is about the content promotion process. It begins when you prepare a summary of your content.  Once preparing a summary of your content occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: repurposing your content, paying for promotion.  Once repurposing your content occurs, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: deep-linking to the content from older posts, posting on related forums and groups and emailing your subscribers.  Once deep-linking to the content from older posts occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reversing engineer your competition, commenting on related blog posts.  After emailing your subscribers, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: performing outreach and sharing on social media.  The process is now completed.

When deep linking occurs to the content from older posts, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reversing engineer your competition or commenting on related blog posts. The process is split after emailing subscribers into 2 parallel branches: outreach and sharing on social media. The process is now completed.

txt1: The following description is about the content promotion process. It begins when you prepare a summary of your content.  Once preparing a summary of your content occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: repurposing your content, posting on Q&A sites.  When repurposing your content is completed, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: submitting to link roundups, paying for promotion and commenting on related blog posts.  After commenting on related blog posts, the next tasks should be reversing engineer your competition and performing outreach, they should be done in parallel.  When performing outreach is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: posting on related forums and groups, deep-linking to the content from older posts.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following description is about the content promotion process. It begins when you prepare a summary of your content. When a summary of your content is prepared, one or more of the following paths should be executed : repurposing your content, posting on Q&A sites. When repurposing content is completed, the process is split into 3 parallel branches - submitting links to linking rounds, paying for promotion and commenting on related blog posts. After commenting on related blog posts, the next task should be reverse engineer your competition and perform outreach, they should be done in parallel. When the outreach process is finished, one or more of the following paths should be carried out: posting on related forums and groups and deep-linking to the content from older posts. The process is now finished.
